name: LAOS Network
description: LAOS is the first Layer 1 protocol connected without bridges to Ethereum, Polygon and other EVM-compatible chains, capable of offloading more than 20% of all their transactions. It enables unlimited NFT minting on these networks at lower costs, bypassing native gas fees. This approach eliminates the need for bridges or wrapped currencies while maintaining compatibility with existing DApps. LAOS is being used by games, metaverses and RWA creators to mint assets in their millions, and merge Free-2-Play mechanics with web3.
